full_threads.body:
[image: Kinsta Logo]
The best home for modern WordPress sites


Hi Andy,
Our monitoring systems detected that your site *barry (Live), is showing an
error (SSL Handshake) related to its SSL certificate.*

Open site in MyKinsta
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuu1hzQXclRcLI-2FuCPVgq06v0y2XORwOvLXIx3c5Du3vifCj-2B-2FxCKpBH63G5HxESquqjwOhns8CD937jYt-2BsnxiR-2FLZUm7wG0ccw7-2FDTRWUdvoHxOxgk13oEv7Gg8HkQXsJBhpaABRbwvRaMJsACx8cCrpb7Z4A1ILsIXDNGvEb1DahiRTTcwkjBfBBnviYv-2BU2FefIMpbmBqW9vD76UCseM-3DTNqz_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKBC7a1tpVbBnkqlSy9tO2N5StySdPtZZTCLdTq9FbyC8X43tr-2BP-2FIO02keyXEevWWp5nhW0A0JXFQPizOH8Xy7Be2AyZbBVe-2FOE8FXYLWk-2FeWQMbns6a3cDbwGCwQxSGP-2FAaTc7sjRMNm4sYuLiP2IbXbE1KlIVfPt-2BNMPQYJymjU4ia7EXaZwQP4J720kmxhw-3D>
You may want to double-check and fix the certificate to avoid any HTTPS
errors displayed on your site.
You can read all about installing and troubleshooting SSL in our
Documentation:
How to Install SSL Certificate on Your WordPress Site
<https://u9019290.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.6QPP-2FqJt5LKc0sK5s9FWuowMewsD0yG1GbJf9SzgPBq992qho52qQ0fhXJGSTe-2Fr3WPHlBeAmqUmjbogtdaO50RV7K5r0A4fc6tQVLikPaHy85KLIvGNBbtOYDw4F3F3e52VQ-2BoA1woJix7kjDHGS2QrxaNBqovDtUUg9YGHDTo-3D9thD_QhWGwQhi9gh0EXq7EEln2gTtEY8uizMkeyIYnCUJGKBC7a1tpVbBnkqlSy9tO2N5YgBmqyqZBEFGQeYFj-2BW6fOSCIArJASiRSIE5AO-2BW1cvJPIU-2BycdLlmeIOEPOXWne-2FWIc01o-2FGhZ54AfPTW1LyIPtLvmcsURSXJQ3l23evXnl4Rsb14-2Fx64h79PKDyqZaQLVWcPf8yt0jujq839rT0js0pkwJzaIZsjl2n8ADa24-3D>
If you are actively working on the site you may ignore this message. In any
case, we’ll keep monitoring this issue but only notify you again if the
problem persists after 72 hours.
If you have any questions feel free to reach out to our support team by
responding to this email or by opening a conversation within MyKinsta. We
are available 24/7 to assist you!
